languages.text: "Спрашивай. Если хочешь стать партнером — только скажи, я согласен".
"Ask away. If you feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."
languages.original_text: "Спрашивай. Если хочешь стать партнером — только скажи, я согласен".

traits.locale_text: "Ask away. If feel like becoming a partner, just say the word, I'm all for it."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Ask away. If feel like becoming a partner, just say the word, I'm all for it."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Ask away. If feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."

traits.locale_text: "Ask away. If feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "Ask away. If you feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “尽管问吧。如果你打算当我的合伙人，只要说一声就好，我完全赞成。”
languages.original_text: "Ask away. If you feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."

traits.locale_text: “尽管问吧。如果你打算当我的合伙人，只要说一声就好，我完全赞成。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「いいですよ。我々と手を組みたいならご自由に――あなたなら大歓迎です」
languages.original_text: "Ask away. If you feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."

traits.locale_text: 「いいですよ。我々と手を組みたいならご自由に――あなたなら大歓迎です」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Pregunte sin miedo. Si quiere que seamos aliados, solo tiene que decirlo; por mi parte no hay problema».
languages.original_text: "Ask away. If you feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."

traits.locale_text: «Pregunte sin miedo. Si quiere que seamos aliados, solo tiene que decirlo; por mi parte no hay problema».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "Ask away. If you feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."

languages.text: « Je vous écoute. Si vous voulez qu'on s'associe, vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire. »
languages.original_text: "Ask away. If you feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous écoute. Si vous voulez qu'on s'associe, vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Fragt ruhig. Wenn Ihr eine Partnerschaft eingehen wollt, sagt es einfach – ich bin dafür."
languages.original_text: "Ask away. If you feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."

traits.locale_text: "Fragt ruhig. Wenn Ihr eine Partnerschaft eingehen wollt, sagt es einfach – ich bin dafür."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Sor bakalım. İş ortağı olmak istersen söylemen yeterli, bana gayet uyar."
languages.original_text: "Ask away. If you feel like becoming a partner, just say the word — I'm all for it."

traits.locale_text: "Sor bakalım. İş ortağı olmak istersen söylemen yeterli, bana gayet uyar."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
